{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = GameShell: Redefine Portable Game Console |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.clockworkpi.com/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ClockworkPi_GameShell_v3.1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ClockworkPi |model = GameShell |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v3.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = portable game console |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;R16-J; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 |cpu1spd = 1.2 GHz <!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3L |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B8G1646DMYKO; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.2;Debian 9;
|exp_if_types = MicroUSB, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Audio out 3.5mm jack, Bluetooth 4.0, I2C, SPI, GPIO, Li-ion battery, |addchip = Single-Cell Li-Battery and Power System Management IC;X-Powers;AXP223;;1;,,, Low Power Transmitter HDMI 1.4 3D;iTE;IT66121FN;;1;,,, USB to serial interface;WCH;CH340G;;1;,,, 8-bit AVR RISC-based microcontroller;Atmel;ATmega168PA;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = cpi |defaultpass = cpi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2018 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07QKKDT9H |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO 2.0 |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== * CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' R16-J Quad-core Cortex-A7 * GPU: Mali-400 MP2 * Memory: 1GB DDR3L * Storage: TF card (max. 64GB) / MMC card slot * WiFi & BT: AMPAK AP6212, Bluetooth 4.0
==Links of Interest== [https://github.com/clockworkpi Source Code]
*[https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/954662076/gameshell-redefine-retro-game-console/description ''GameShell'' on '''kickstarter''] *[https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/gameshell-open-source-retro-gaming-stem-console#/ ''GameShell'' on '''INDIEGOGO'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/11/24/gameshell-portable-retro-gaming-console-features-clockwork-pi-allwinner-r16-board-crowdfunding/ ''GameShell Portable Retro Gaming Console'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
